p: The results of questionnaires showed that 20% of the informants were diagnosed with their diseases by a doctor, and 45% were diagnosed with a conventional therapist, and 35% self-diagnosed their diseases, while the results of the questionnaires showed that the evaluation of the treatment by informants as following (58% relied on the disappearance of symptoms, and 24% through the results of laboratory analysis, 18% adopted other methods such as chest radiography, adopting the attending physicianâ€™s opinion and clinical observation of the improvement of skin diseases, and some of them depended on psychological comfort during treatment as evidence of improvement).
